name: UIFieldBehavior
desc: An object that applies field-based physics to dynamic items.

items.name: class func dragField() -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a field behavior for slowing an object’s velocity.

items.name: class func springField() -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a spring field behavior.

items.name: class func velocityField(direction: CGVector) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a field behavior object that applies a directional velocity to items.

items.name: class func electricField() -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a field behavior object that interacts with charged items.

items.name: class func magneticField() -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a field behavior that interacts with charged items.

items.name: class func radialGravityField(position: CGPoint) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a field behavior object that models a radial gravitational force.

items.name: class func linearGravityField(direction: CGVector) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a field behavior object that models a linear gravitational force.

items.name: class func vortexField() -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a field behavior object that applies a rotational force relative to the field’s position.

items.name: class func noiseField(smoothness: CGFloat, animationSpeed: CGFloat) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a field behavior object that applies random noise to other forces.

items.name: class func turbulenceField(smoothness: CGFloat, animationSpeed: CGFloat) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a field behavior object that applies noise to an item in motion.

items.name: class func field(evaluationBlock: (UIFieldBehavior, CGPoint, CGVector, CGFloat, CGFloat, TimeInterval) -> CGVector) -> Self
items.desc: Creates and returns a field behavior object that applies an app-specified field to items.

items.name: func addItem(UIDynamicItem)
items.desc: Associates the field behavior with the specified dynamic item.

items.name: func removeItem(UIDynamicItem)
items.desc: Removes the field behavior from the specified dynamic item.

items.name: var items: [UIDynamicItem]
items.desc: The dynamic items associated with the current field behavior.

items.name: var position: CGPoint
items.desc: The position of the field in the reference coordinate system.

items.name: var region: UIRegion
items.desc: The shape of the field.

items.name: var strength: CGFloat
items.desc: The strength of the field.

items.name: var falloff: CGFloat
items.desc: The rate of decay for the field strength.

items.name: var minimumRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum distance at which to start calculating new values for the field.

items.name: var direction: CGVector
items.desc: The direction of motion for a linear field.

items.name: var smoothness: CGFloat
items.desc: The smoothness of the noise used to generate the field.

items.name: var animationSpeed: CGFloat
items.desc: The rate at which the animation should proceed.
